price: Kuma mutum yanã* yin addu'a da sharri kamar addu'arsa da alhẽri, kuma mutum ya kasance mai gaggãwa.
arabic: وَيَدۡعُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ بِٱلشَّرِّ دُعَآءَهُۥ بِٱلۡخَيۡرِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ عَجُولٗا
footnotes: * Alƙur'ani yanã shiryar da mutum har ga yadda yake yin addu'a dõmin kada ya yi wa kansa addu'a ta sharri alhãli kuwa yanã nufin ya yi alhħri dõmin an halicci mutum da son gaggãwa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayadʿu al-insānu bil-shari duʿāahu bil-khayri wakāna al-insānu ʿajūlan
